title: wtf is you malfunction riot with hextech
body: so ive did the poorly explained overly complex yet vague project crafting. however when i was handed a project skin i already had i used it with the two skins for champs i dont have to reroll. i thought when you reroll you get a free skin but you GAVE ME A SKIN FOR A CHAMP I DONT OWN AND DONT PLAN TO. what should i do. ive just wasted enough ip to get a decent champ and all i got was some summoner icons and a useless skin. i had faith in you riot.

replies.body:
Rerolling, just like opening hextech chests, gives you a completely random result. The only modifier here is that it prioritizes for content you don't already own. For complete details on the system, check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)

I recommend either exploring that champ you got a skin for or disenchanting the skin. Let me know if you have any questions.
